language.name: English
language.author: Refract studios
pausemenu.title: Paused
gamemode.sprint.description: Survive the track and race to the end.
gamemode.challenge.description: No resetting, no checkpoints. Only raw challenge on short tracks.
gamemode.stunt.description: Perform crazy tricks and earn a high score to beat out the competition.
gamemode.trackmogrify.description: Enter a phrase and randomly generate an entire level. How creative can you get?
gamemode.reversetag.description: One player is tagged and their timer increases. Everyone else chases them down. First player whose timer hits 3 mins wins.
gamemode.adventure.description: Drive into the heart of the Array as you pursue a deadly, mysterious threat.
gamemode.losttoechoes.description: Return to where it all began...
gamemode.nexus.description: Take to the skies. Upload the package to the Nexus core and escape. (v1.1 DLC)
gamemode.leveleditorplay.description: Test your levels in this mode
trackmogrify.seed.placeholder: Leave blank for a random seed...
workshop.visit.description: Discover new community-created content on Steam Workshop.
workshop.download.description: Check for any newly subscribed levels.
workshop.update.description: Check for updates to each one of your subscriptions.
workshop.unsubscribe.description: Unsubscribe to every one of your subscriptions.
settings.audio.title: Audio Options
settings.audio.custommusic.folder.type: Type in folder and press Enter...
settings.general.title: General Options
settings.controls.title: Controls Options
settings.graphics.title: Graphics Options
settings.graphics.videosettings.title: Video Settings
settings.graphics.videosettings.fullscre: Whether the game runs in fullscreen or in windowed mode.
settings.graphics.videosettings.vsync.de: Reduces visual tearing by synchronizing the frame rate of the game with your monitor refresh rate. Enabling this may degrade graphics performance.
settings.graphics.bonuseffects.title: Bonus Effects
settings.graphics.bonuseffects.letterbox: Locks the in-game aspect ratio to give the game a more cinematic feel.
Warning: This is only a fun bonus effect and not required!
settings.graphics.advanced.title: Advanced
settings.graphics.advanced.bloom.descrip: Adds the signature glow effect to the screen along with high-dynamic-range lighting (HDR).
settings.graphics.advanced.filmgrain.des: Adds a subtle film static effect.
settings.graphics.advanced.vignetting.de: Darkens edges of the screen and enables a dynamic chromatic aberration based on car impacts.
settings.graphics.advanced.radialblur.de:
Blurs the edges of the screen based on the car's speed.
Helps with the sense of speed.
settings.graphics.advanced.sunshafts.des: Simulates radial light scattering by adding volumetric rays of light within the world.
settings.graphics.advanced.reflections.d: Adds dynamic reflections to the exterior of the car.
settings.graphics.advanced.reflections.w: Warning: Enabling this may dramatically degrade graphics performance.
settings.graphics.advanced.anisotropic.d: Enhances image quality for objects in the distance.
settings.graphics.advanced.particles.des: Adds particles in the environment such as sparks or clouds of smoke.
settings.graphics.advanced.texturequalit: Turning down texture quality may improve the game's memory footprint but will significantly degrade image quality.
Smooths edges of geometry to help eliminate the appearance jagged edges.
Adjusts how far into the distance objects are rendered.
Increasing this may significantly degrade graphics performance.
settings.graphics.advanced.shadowquality:
Adjusts the draw distance and smoothness of shadows.
Increasing this may significantly degrade graphics performance.
settings.graphics.advanced.motionblur.de: Adds a blur to moving objects which gives their motion a more realistic feel.
settings.graphics.advanced.cardents.desc: Allows the car to be procedurally deformed according to the speed an angle of impacts.
settings.graphics.advanced.lighting.desc: Improves the quality of environments lighting by enabling additional lights.
settings.profiles.title: Profile Options
settings.profiles.select.title: Select Primary Profile
settings.profiles.create.title: Create a new profile
settings.profiles.edit.title: [c][848484]Edit selected profile:[-][/c] {0}
settings.vr.title: VR Options
settings.vr.enable.description: Enables VR support in the game (may require a restart to function properly).
settings.vr.camerashake.description: Camera shakes on impacts and overheat.
settings.vr.neckspring.description: Connects the camera to the car with a spring instead of directly. Helps soften impacts when focusing on the road ahead, and not the cockpit.
settings.vr.renderscale.description: Scales the size of the render buffer, trading performance for picture quality.
settings.vr.steerdampening.description: Dampens car-steering speed, to reduce jerky steering, which may cause VR sickness.
settings.vr.inclinecamera.description: Rotates the camera when on inclines so the user can better percieve car orientation.
settings.vr.worldscale.description: Scales the perception of the world and the car.
settings.vr.thirdpersoncamera.descriptio: Enables the other camera modes. These other modes are not adjusted for VR comfort, use at your own risk!
settings.vr.thirdpersonscalar.descriptio: Scales the world when in 3rd person.
settings.replay.title: Replay and Ghost Options
settings.cheats.title: Cheat Options
settings.cheats.campaignplus.description: [FF6347]To Unlock:[-] Complete: Blast From the Past
This cheat only works in Campaign.
[FF6347]You will need to restart the level for this to fully take effect.[-]
settings.cheats.motorcyclemode.descripti: [FF6347]To Unlock:[-] Complete: Better Than Sliced Bread
This cheat affects gameplay and is disabled in online play.
settings.cheats.monstertruck.description: This cheat affects gameplay and is disabled in online play.
settings.cheats.skywalker.description.un: This cheat affects gameplay and is disabled in online play.
settings.cheats.filmnoir.description.loc: [FF6347]To Unlock:[-] Complete: Down but Not Out
settings.cheats.filmnoir.description.unl: [9ACD50]Visual[-]: Adds a stylistic black and white filter to the screen
settings.cheats.stylizedoutlines.descrip: [9ACD50]Visual[-]: Increases saturation and adds bold outlines to objects
settings.cheats.superboost.description.u: [008080]Gameplay[-]: In case the car feels too slow
This cheat affects gameplay and is disabled in online play.
settings.cheats.bubblecar.description.un: [9ACD50]Visual[-]: Changes car visuals to a more rounded look
settings.cheats.deathproof.description.u: This cheat affects gameplay and is disabled in online play.
settings.cheats.preservationalboosterslo: [008080]Gameplay[-]: Take a ride on the wild side
This cheat affects gameplay and is disabled in online play.
subtitles.abyss_warp.2: The path ahead gives us purpose.
subtitles.ascension_warp.1: Remember that pieces form the whole.
subtitles.ascension_warp.2: All paths lead to the door.
subtitles.cb_abyss.0: [999999](Intercom)[-] Alert: Critical failure. All life support systems have failed.
subtitles.cb_ascension3.0: [999999](Intercom)[-] The Array has safely utilized energy from gamma ray bursts for many years.
subtitles.cb_ascension3.1: This allows for the operation of bioengineering, advanced machine learning, and of course, teleportation.
subtitles.cb_ascension3.2: In response to Earth Incident Two Fifteen, the following precautions have been put into place:
subtitles.cb_ascension3.3: Peak output has been limited to 9 cycles.
subtitles.cb_ascension3.4: An automatic override will take place if peak output is approached.
subtitles.cb_ascension3.5: Life support systems function off of a separate power routing
subtitles.cb_ascension3.6: and will always remain functional in case of emergency.
subtitles.cb_ascension3.8: so that no one power core can contain enough power for destabilization.
subtitles.cb_automation1.0: [999999](Intercom)[-] The Distance project is our path to life among the stars.
subtitles.cb_automation1.1: We aim to push teleportation farther than ever before.
subtitles.cb_automation1.2: Earth is behind us. Remember her, learn from her, go beyond her.
subtitles.cb_automation2.0: [999999](Intercom)[-] All available energy is being diverted to Sector 01 teleportation chamber.
subtitles.cb_automation2.1: Automated production has been halted until power levels are restored.
subtitles.cb_cataclysm1.0: [999999](Intercom)[-] The Array is our new home.
subtitles.cb_cataclysm1.1: By combining the resources of satellite sectors, the Array functions as one metropolis.
subtitles.cb_cataclysm1.2: From energy storage to food production, each sector serves a purpose.
subtitles.cb_cataclysm1.3: Remember that pieces form the whole.
subtitles.cb_cataclysm2b.0: Alert: Fatal oxygen levels present in this sector.
subtitles.cb_cataclysm2b.1: Evacuate immediately to the nearest quarantine zone.
subtitles.cb_cataclysm2b.2: Use caution and follow the signs when engaging in sector teleportation.
subtitles.cb_cataclysm2c.0: [999999](Intercom)[-] Warning: Infection status of Sectors 11, 09, and 08 can not be determined.
subtitles.cb_cataclysm2c.1: Paths have been disabled until status can be verified.
subtitles.cb_contagion1.1: All life support systems have been disabled.
subtitles.cb_contagion1.2: Unable to recover backup systems. Evacuate immediately.
subtitles.cb_contagion2.1: Power levels approaching threshold. Opening in:
subtitles.cb_contagion3.0: [999999](Intercom)[-] Your mental and physical well being is of great concern to the administration.
subtitles.cb_contagion3.1: While the directive will always remain your highest priority,
subtitles.cb_contagion3.2: be sure to schedule an appointment with a Sector physician if you feel your work quality is suffering.
subtitles.cb_diversion1a.0: [999999](Intercom)[-] Primary teleportation sequence to Earth initiated.
subtitles.cb_diversion1a.2: Routing all nonessential energy to Sector 01.
subtitles.cb_diversion1b.0: Alert: Anomaly present in teleportation chamber. Sequence can not be halted.
subtitles.cb_diversion1b.1: Chamber must be purged to prevent the anomaly from reaching the planet.
subtitles.cb_diversion2.0: [999999](Intercom)[-] To assist in your transition to life aboard the Array,
subtitles.cb_diversion2.1: the administration has installed several amenities:
subtitles.cb_diversion2.2: Visit the Transit Center in Sector 17 for easy teleportation between various sectors.
subtitles.cb_diversion2.3: The Amusement District can be located in Sector 14.
subtitles.cb_diversion2.4: Medical repair is available in Sector 03.
subtitles.cb_embers1.0: [999999](Intercom)[-] Alert: Infection detected in sector. All life support systems have failed.
subtitles.cb_embers1.1: Evacuate immediately to the nearest quarantine zone.
subtitles.cb_embers2.1: all hazardous waste must be collected in this sector.
subtitles.cb_embers2.2: Remember that improper waste disposal was one of many contributors to Earth incident Two Fifteen.
subtitles.cb_enemy1.0: [999999](Intercom)[-] The teleporter to Earth is now opening.
subtitles.cb_enemy1.1: Organic matter must keep a safe distance from the teleporter at all times.
subtitles.cb_entanglement1.1: Organic matter must keep a safe distance from the teleporter at all times.
subtitles.cb_entanglement1.2: To maintain a sense of relative position and rotation,
subtitles.cb_entanglement1.3: focus ahead as you travel through the teleporter.
subtitles.cb_entanglement2.0: [999999](Intercom)[-] You have successfully completed a short range teleportation.
subtitles.cb_entanglement2.1: Teleportation is used for efficient travel from sector to sector, as well as for quick shortcuts.
subtitles.cb_entanglement2.2: Always be aware of your orientation after exiting a teleporter.
subtitles.cb_entanglement3.0: [999999](Intercom)[-] Primary teleportation sequence to Earth will soon begin.
subtitles.cb_entanglement3.2: Routing all nonessential energy to Sector 01.
subtitles.cb_entanglement4.1: the Array’s generated atmosphere can no longer be electrified.
subtitles.cb_entanglement4.2: Particles are continually recycled and evaluated.
subtitles.cb_entanglement4.3: Expect to see fewer fatalities as this prevents dangerous Earth phenomena
subtitles.cb_entanglement4.4: like lightning and dramatic temperature changes.
subtitles.cb_euphoria1.1: Unable to shutdown automated visual systems.
subtitles.cb_euphoria2.1: Communication with administration has been lost.
subtitles.cb_friction2.1: As resources on Earth continue to fade,
subtitles.cb_friction2.2: we aim to push beyond our humble beginnings and expand to new horizons.
subtitles.cb_friction2.3: As a part of the Distance project you’ll be the first to witness our people’s greatest discoveries.
subtitles.cb_friction2.4: Always push forward, and obey the directive.
subtitles.cb_isolation2.0: [999999](Intercom)[-] Life aboard the Array will likely be an adjustment.
subtitles.cb_isolation2.1: To move forward we must bury our past.
subtitles.cb_isolation2.2: Family and friends are only a distraction,
subtitles.cb_isolation2.3: and communication with the planet surface is strictly prohibited.
subtitles.cb_isolation2.4: Remember her, learn from her, go beyond her.
subtitles.cb_isolation3.0: [999999](Intercom)[-] Life support systems have been successfully stabilized
subtitles.cb_isolation3.2: Please remain calm and wait for extraction.
subtitles.cb_isolation4.0: [999999](Intercom)[-] Warning: Entering dangerous zone. Infection detected in this sector.
subtitles.cb_isolation4.1: Several life support systems have failed due to infection. Proceed with caution.
subtitles.cb_overload3.1: 1,047 casualties recorded since the start of infection.
subtitles.cb_overload3.2: Communication with administration has been lost for
subtitles.cb_research1.1: Several life support systems have been fully disabled.
subtitles.cb_research1.2: Attempting to recover backup systems. Evacuate immediately.
subtitles.cb_research2a.1: Infection specimens successfully quarantined and available for inspection.
subtitles.cb_research2a.2: Origin of the infection source is unknown.
subtitles.cb_research2a.3: The infection appears to be simultaneously technological and organic,
subtitles.cb_research2a.4: with a chaotic and unpredictable spread.
subtitles.cb_research2a.5: Nanotechnology is assumed as the building block for the virus,
subtitles.cb_research2a.6: though when observed closely the underlying material is still undefined.
subtitles.cb_research2a.7: In the process of infecting technology aboard the Array,
subtitles.cb_research2a.8: the infection seems to overload existing power conduits
subtitles.cb_research2a.9: and create new pathways for power to travel.
subtitles.cb_research2a.10: This leads to total power failure in sector systems
subtitles.cb_research2a.11: before returning back online under the influence of infected power.
subtitles.cb_research2b.0: [999999](Intercom)[-] Danger! Containment failure. Breach in containment units 03, 08, and 21.
subtitles.cb_research2b.1: Immediate evacuation is recommended. Emergency power at 24%.
subtitles.cb_research3.0: [999999](Intercom)[-] Containment field compromised. Infection spread imminent.
subtitles.cb_research3.1: Evacuate immediately to the nearest quarantine zone.
subtitles.compression_warp.0: [999999](Intercom)[-] The Distance project is our path to life and death.
subtitles.compression_warp.1: We aim to escape our loop and expand to new horizons.
subtitles.contagion_warp.2: deviation opens our door to reality.
subtitles.entanglement_warp.2: Routing all nonessential energy to this sector.
subtitles.isolation_warp.0: [999999](Intercom)[-] Alert: Infection detected in sector. Evaluating collateral damage.
